column1: Smoque BBQ////I've never been a Brisket eater
column2: but every time I've went I had to get it ( which sucks because I really wanna try their ribs
column3: but get trapped ordering the Brisket!) and I love BBQ sauce! I swear I'd eat an Elephants asshole if it was slathered in BBQ sauce
column4: but this Brisket is so good it seems a crime to cover up the taste with sauce.
